Baltimore County Javacript Demos

Site Specific

A site specific JavaScript file is something that will on every single page of the site.

  • Site Navigation Demo

Page Specific

A page specific JavaScript file is something that will on a single page of the site. Page specific scripts are similar to app / widget scripts, but are usually small and interact with elements of the page, that we would not have control over in our scripts.

  • BaltCoGo Follow-Up Demo

Component Specific

A small library type piece of javascript. These probably should be moved into their own repos.

  • Accordion
  • Modal
  • Step List Demo
